com.aurel.track.item.massOperation

Class MassOperationFieldSetterAction

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.opensymphony.xwork2.ActionSupport
      • com.aurel.track.item.massOperation.MassOperationFieldSetterAction
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.opensymphony.xwork2.Action, com.opensymphony.xwork2.LocaleProvider, com.opensymphony.xwork2.Preparable, com.opensymphony.xwork2.TextProvider, com.opensymphony.xwork2.Validateable, com.opensymphony.xwork2.ValidationAware, java.io.Serializable, org.apache.struts2.interceptor.ServletResponseAware, org.apache.struts2.interceptor.SessionAware

    public class MassOperationFieldSetterAction
extends com.opensymphony.xwork2.ActionSupport
implements com.opensymphony.xwork2.Preparable, org.apache.struts2.interceptor.SessionAware, org.apache.struts2.interceptor.ServletResponseAware
    Configuring a single bulk operation field Each change is instantly stored in the massOperationExpressions list from the session (after submitting the 'small' form corresponding to the field). After each operation (relation change, value change) the corresponding massOperationExpression should be actualized because after a project change the entire page will be refreshed, consequently the massOperationExpressions should be always actual.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
